Reviews.Title: Only Rugged Smartphone in its class!
Reviews.Author: Ricdesan
Reviews.Content: When I went looking for a rugged phone to replace my previous 6 year old dumb phone I found very few options in the marketplace. This was one of them and it was ten bucks cheaper than a dumb phone alternative I located and multiple hundreds cheaper than any other rugged smart phone made.Sounds like a no brainer right? Well, I wouldnt say that as it requires patience! Patience for the 3 weeks to ship from China, time to load the machine with all you want and time to root it and get it to your liking. Part of the issue is even though this phone will take beating unlike few others, its hardware is last gen for sure even though the 1GHZ processor runs Andriod 4.04 snappy it only has 256 each of RAM AND ROM. Now thats not so bad when it has a 16GB micro SD slot to go along with the dual SIM set-up. But its easier knowing that going in and also knowing that a post over at xda-developers.com will help you with the root process via a Chinese app!Once I rooted it,swapped out the slower 4GB class 4 SD that comes with the phone for a class 10 8GB card and loaded the biggest to smallest apps first over to SD and the ROM required apps last this little phone really came into its own. The 3.5 bright screen is just big enough while still fitting in my front pocket and the limited memory will keep the system running smoothly with apps Battery Doctor and Clean master to keep things optimized. It only occasionally prompts me for low RAM yet always frees it up with the help from the utilities I mentioned.Finally, the two cherries on top relate to battery. With moderate usage it will easily last a day between charges and then some! Light usage will stretch that to 2 days and stand by might be a week. The last cherry is the company ships the unit with 2 batteries for that same price. You have to love some value added when not expecting it.So to wrap, this is THE ONLY sub $200 rugged smartphone made that will bounce off the pavement and go swimming with you while still providing a sweet little android environment like the big phones do. If you are willing to take the time, this phone has no competition ... period!

Reviews.Title: Phone did not work properly & NOT waterproof!!
Reviews.Author: Cruiser
Reviews.Content: Recvd. this phone & instruction only in Japanese or Chinese. Phone not waterproof because no o-ring or o-ring around phone backing. After a few days of using, phone quit working. Trying to return phone

Reviews.Title: amazing phone. sooo sweet
Reviews.Author: t.c.
Reviews.Content: So I ordered this phone and they said it would take till November 22 to get it. It was 2 weeks instead of about a month of waiting till I got it which was amazing. They told me they couldn't send a second battery with it which I didn't even know one came with the phone and so they gave me some gifts like a memory card and other stuff. The phone is great and is probably by favorite phone I've had. So this is awesome

Reviews.Title: will order again
Reviews.Author: Dawn Dellapietro "zsazsa"
Reviews.Content: will order again very nice phone.  was very pleased might be ordering two more for Christmas. will order mine shortly. very pleased

Reviews.Content: Everything was Ok except of the coulour of the phone..I thought it would be orange/black, but it was full black..but anyway it looks good..4 star rating because of the colour

Reviews.Content: update after about 3 months the phone craped out... as in started with crackelling in the ear ,,, then mic went ...then wouldnt hold a charge,,,  what a  waist of money

Reviews.Title: Bad product.
Reviews.Author: David W. Nugent
Reviews.Content: I could not even get it to power up and stay powered up to attempt programming. Blank screen or flashes. It is an inferior product and just more imported junk. Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Iuri Nekrasov "pullover"
Reviews.Content: I liked it very much. Works great! Very useful applications. Very thin and rubber protected, touch screen works perfectly. Recommend it!!!

Reviews.Title: Discovery V5
Reviews.Author: nugzar
Reviews.Content: The phone works, I bought this device for hunting, it works well with the nature of its environment Other phone is unable to perform these duties

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone!
Reviews.Author: millie
Reviews.Content: I gave this product 4 stars because it has all the features of a smartphone that I would expect, great sound quality, touchscreen features, and overall worth my money $110. It took about 2 in a half weeks to get to me though estimated at a months time, but I noticed it shipped from Hong Kong! So, not bad for the distance, and the seller kept contact with me and my concerns. Just being curious as I don't know much about these types of phones... why 2 SIM spots?So... if you are expected a replacement phone that's open, try products sold by Amazon only so it'll be no longer than a week or few days .... Also, the camera for this phone is ok, not good quality in dark and no flash, and yes it has a memory slot as well.

Reviews.Title: i received the tv damaged
Reviews.Author: jose luis guerrero
Reviews.Content: i received the tv damaged screen was heading, as I can not give me warranty for this product. I cheated

Reviews.Title: Phone Sucks.......
Reviews.Author: Salina
Reviews.Content: Phone worked great for the first three months. It was compatible with the local phone services as well as ISP.  Unfortunately it stopped working for NO reason.  It did not fall!!!! Was going to work when I realized that the security pattern wasn't working. Got to work tried again, then I get the message that I exceeded the number of tries and was prompted to log into my Google account. Hellooooooo??????  the screen isn't working, after numerous tries of typing in "P" and "o" to get the username and the password into the appropriate box, I can't press login button.  The phone screen closes. I have to restart the process. So I restarted a few times, Removed the battery and sim. No luck. The phone is a waste. Regret the purchase. Was good while it lasted but the life span is ridiculous. Back to my old faithful......

Reviews.Title: bought phone for a birthday and will enjoy it
Reviews.Author: Henry Googe
Reviews.Content: If anyone wants a rugged phone this is a good start.I gave this phone to a 10 yr. and she likes it.

Reviews.Title: BUMMED OUT :(
Reviews.Author: Cassandra S.
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong the phone was perfect and turned on.... But US Cellular wouldn't activate it because it is not one of their phones!? Lame!! Im sure it would b an awesome phone for another phone company, but I was super disappointed!

Reviews.Content: not as recommended,vry bad phone, not well functioning, i am really dissapointed because of the quality was not as what i am expected.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!!!
Reviews.Author: BEN JAMIN
Reviews.Content: This product is terrible. The 2nd SIM card didnt work. The Company refused to send me another device. DO NOT be scammed by these guys EITHER!! PHONE service is slow. Screen is not as durable as suggested and as far as "waterproof" goes, its a lie. Another piece of cheap CHINA plastic.

The english is a general for all models. Catalog H9500.Plese if you can help me to obtain the spanish manual, please do it.best regardsjesus

Reviews.Title: Broke after 2 falls
Reviews.Author: kimberley
Reviews.Content: This phone was a christmas gift to a very active 13 year old boy who plays lots of sports. His last few phones fell and broke so we thought this phone would be able to withstand a few falls inside a jacket pocket. Apparently it can't. The "unbreakable" screen is cracked and broken beyond repair after one fall on a skateboard inside a thick coat. This obviously means that it isn't shockproof either. I'm very disappointed that a phone like this breaks like the rest of them. Don't even bother with this one! It was a complete waste of money.This phone lasted a total of 3 weeks.

Reviews.Title: i saw on the box that it came in that it had radio but when we check we couldnd find it in the system

Reviews.Content: i think you were false avertising my husband only wanted that because of the fadio so the he can listen to music while to work and now he cant we check every thing we tried every thing and even try downloading it but only if you are in a hot spot you can use it that is why i gave that rating ! if you know how the phone works with the radio can you email me back?
